translation.en: [music playing from Mother] ♪ Moon river, wider than a mile ♪
translation.fr:
Rivière de la lune
Large de plus d'un kilomètre

translation.en: -♪ Hold me close and hold me fast ♪ -[baby continues crying]
-♪ Rest your head close to my heart ♪ -[crying]
translation.fr: Pose ton visage contre mon cœur

translation.en: ♪ Don't you mind what they say ♪
translation.fr: Peu importe ce que les gens disent

translation.en: ♪ Let those eyes sparkle and shine ♪
translation.fr: Que tes yeux s'illuminent et brillent

translation.en: ♪ Never a tear, baby of mine ♪
-♪ From your head to your toes ♪ -♪ Baby mine ♪
translation.fr:
- De la tête aux pieds
- Mon bébé
Tu es si doux, Dieu sait combien
Tu es si doux, Dieu sait combien Mon bébé

translation.en: ♪ You are so precious to me ♪
translation.fr: Tu es si précieux à mes yeux

translation.en: [Daughter] Why aren't there any more children, Mother?
translation.fr: Pourquoi il n'y a plus d'enfants, Mère ?

translation.en: [Mother] There used to be. Before the wars.
translation.fr: Avant, il y en avait. Avant les guerres.

translation.en: [Daughter] I don't want to be a human.
translation.fr: Je ne veux pas être un humain.

translation.en: [Daughter] Then why did you only make one?
My brothers and sisters are in those?
translation.fr: Mes frères et sœurs sont là-dedans ?

translation.en: [Mother] Would you like to meet them?
They're small now but, one day,
translation.fr: Ils sont petits, mais un jour,

translation.en: they'll be as big as you.
Do you think I'll have a brother or a sister?
translation.fr:
Tu penses que j'aurai
un frère ou une sœur ?

translation.en: That would make me happy too.
Why couldn't we be born together?
translation.fr: Pourquoi on n'est pas nés ensemble ?

translation.en: Do you think you'll be ready soon?
And then we can be a family?
How long's it been like that?
[Mother] Imagine a doctor has five patients,
translation.fr:
Imagine un médecin
qui a cinq patients.

translation.en: all in need of different organ transplants, but no compatible organs are available.
translation.fr:
Tous ont besoin d'une greffe,
mais il n'y a pas d'organes compatibles.

translation.en: One day, a sixth patient enters the doctor's office with a life-threatening condition.
translation.fr:
Un jour, un sixième patient
se présente avec une maladie grave.

translation.en: but also an organ match for the five other patients.
translation.fr:
mais ses organes sont compatibles
avec les cinq autres patients.

translation.en: If the doctor simply delays treatment, the new patient will die,
translation.fr:
Si le médecin retarde le traitement,
il mourra,

translation.en: but their organs could be used to save the other five patients.
translation.fr:
mais ses organes pourront
sauver la vie des autres patients.

translation.en: If the doctor treats the new patient, one life will be saved, but five others will be lost.
translation.fr:
Si le docteur soigne le nouveau patient,
il sauvera une vie, mais en perdra cinq.

translation.en: What is the doctor's best course of action?
translation.fr:
Quelle est la meilleure
ligne de conduite ?

translation.en: Some. We can select a different text.
translation.fr:
- Un peu.
- On peut choisir un autre texte.

translation.en: However, your birthday is rapidly approaching and it would be a shame
translation.fr:
Mais ton anniversaire arrive
à grands pas et ce serait dommage

translation.en: if your scores failed to meet the projections from last year's examination.
translation.fr:
que tu n'atteignes pas
l'objectif projeté l'an passé.

translation.en: -But you set the pace, Daughter. -Bentham's fine.
translation.fr:
- À toi de voir.
- Bentham, ça me va.

translation.en: that a person is morally obligated
to minimize the pain to the greatest number possible.
translation.fr:
de réduire la souffrance
d'un maximum de gens.

translation.en: Now, consider that you are the doctor
translation.fr: Imagine que tu es le médecin

translation.en: and also the only organ match for your patients. What then is the right choice?
translation.fr:
et le seul donneur compatible
pour les patients, que faire ?

translation.en: I mean, Comte says I should be willing to suffer harm for the benefit of others.
translation.fr:
Comte dit que je dois accepter
de souffrir pour le bien des autres.

translation.en: Well, do I know these five patients?
might be giving my life for people who are murderers or thieves...
translation.fr:
je risque de me sacrifier
pour de potentiels criminels

translation.en: who end up harming more people due to my sacrifice.
translation.fr: qui risquent de faire du tort aux gens.

translation.en: You don't feel that every human has intrinsic value and an equal right to life and happiness?
translation.fr:
Tu ne penses pas que tous les humains
ont droit à la vie et au bonheur ?

translation.en: I did last month, when you were teaching Kant.
translation.fr:
Le mois dernier, oui,
en étudiant Kant.

translation.en: I didn't mean to alarm you about your exam.
translation.fr:
Je ne veux pas t'inquiéter
pour tes examens.

translation.en: The fact is it's more a test of my competence than yours.
translation.fr: C'est plus un test de mes compétences.

translation.en: You'll do great, Daughter. You always do.
translation.fr: Tu vas réussir, Fille. Comme toujours.

translation.en: -Were you doing a movie? -Yeah. -Yeah. -With Carl Reiner directing too.
translation.fr:
- Vous tourniez un film ?
- Avec Carl Reiner.

translation.en: We can talk about that the next time you come on.
-Okay. Thanks for being here. -Yeah. I appreciate it. -Thank you very much. -Steve Martin. Thank you.

translation.fr: C'est toi qui as fait ça ?

translation.en: [Daughter] Come on, come on, come on.
It was crawling around near the airlock.
Do you think it could be from outside?
translation.fr: Tu penses qu'il vient de l'extérieur ?

translation.en: It's highly unlikely. But a risk we can't take.
translation.fr:
C'est peu probable.
Mais ne prenons pas de risque.

translation.en: You said nothing could survive out there.
translation.fr:
Tu as dit qu'il n'y avait
pas de vie dehors.

translation.en: Maybe the surface is safe now.
If it survived beyond these walls, that doesn't mean it's not a carrier.
translation.fr:
Ce n'est pas parce qu'il a survécu
qu'il n'est pas contaminé.

translation.en: Mother, wait. Shouldn't we at least check?
Wait a second! Don't you think there could be a possibility that--
translation.fr:
Attends un peu.
Tu crois qu'il y a une possibilité que...

translation.en: Surface contamination levels remain hazardous to you
translation.fr:
La contamination de la surface
est dangereuse pour toi

translation.en: and to all the unborns who will one day call this their home.
translation.fr:
et tous les embryons
qui seront un jour ici chez eux.

translation.en: You had better take a shower.
[man on tablet] They travel with relatives or a few other families.
Part wolf, part dog, these are no pets.
translation.fr:
Mi-chiens, mi-loups,
ce ne sont pas des animaux de compagnie.

translation.en: But without them, the Eskimos would not manage--
translation.fr:
Mais sans eux,
les Inuits ne pourraient pas...

translation.en: [Mother] I don't want you coming near the airlock
until I can confirm the area is uncontaminated.
translation.fr: tant que la zone n'est pas décontaminée.

translation.en: Where are your pajamas from last night?
translation.fr:
Où est ton pyjama
de la nuit dernière ?
Dans le linge sale, je crois.

translation.en: I was beginning to think you forgot where the laundry was, Daughter.
translation.fr:
Je croyais que tu avais oublié
où il se trouvait.

translation.en: That was an attempt at humor.
I had to dispose of your others, but I know they were your favorite.
translation.fr:
J'ai dû jeter l'autre,
je sais que c'est ton préféré.

translation.en: [Mother] Would you like me to heat it more?
You know you can talk to me, Daughter, about anything.
translation.fr: Tu sais que tu peux tout me dire, Fille.

translation.en: I can make you something else.
How will you know if you don't go outside?
translation.fr: Comment savoir, si tu ne sors pas ?

translation.en: Doing so could make me a hazard to you.
translation.fr:
Je risquerais de devenir
un danger pour toi.

translation.en: -No, but-- -I want you to be happy, Daughter.
translation.fr:
- Non, mais...
- Je veux que tu sois heureuse.

translation.en: -I am. I just think-- -Have you ever known me to be mistaken?
translation.fr:
- Je le suis, mais...
-  Me suis-je déjà trompée ?

translation.en: You hear me? I'm here alone!
I need you to put on that suit.
I can't let you in if you don't.
I'm sorry, but that's the only way.
translation.fr: Désolée, mais vous n'avez pas le choix.

translation.en: [woman] Look, I won't make it out there.
Just let me tend to this.
But you need to keep out of sight.
I'll be back as soon as I can.
I only opened it for a second.
Did you think that suit would keep you safe? I didn't go outside.
translation.fr:
- Te crois-tu protégée ?
- Je ne suis pas sortie.

translation.en: That does not excuse your disregard for my authority
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas une raison pour me désobéir

translation.en: or for the safety of the others in this facility.
translation.fr: ou mettre les autres en danger.

translation.en: Come, Daughter. I hope you show better discretion than this on your exam.
translation.fr:
Viens. J'espère que tu seras
plus raisonnable pour ton examen.

translation.en: Since you don't seem to want to sleep, I see no reason to delay.
translation.fr:
Puisque tu ne dors plus,
pourquoi attendre ?

translation.en: I suggest you shower off and head straight to class. It's going to be a long day.
translation.fr:
Prends une douche et va en classe.
La journée va être longue.

translation.en: You have 60 minutes to complete the first portion of your exam.
translation.fr:
Tu as 60 minutes
pour terminer la première partie.

translation.en: If you're finished before I return, you can read.
translation.fr:
Si tu as fini avant mon retour,
tu peux lire.

translation.en: I have lab work to complete and I must see to the airlock.
translation.fr:
Je dois travailler au laboratoire
et vérifier le sas.
Est-ce que tu as de l'antiseptique ?

translation.en: I will have, but I need you to come with me.
translation.fr: Si, mais il faut me suivre.

translation.en: Who put that in your head?
[Daughter] Will you be okay until I get back?
translation.fr: Ça va aller d'ici mon retour ?

translation.en: I'm going to get your medicine and I'll try and speak to Mother.
translation.fr:
Je vais chercher des médicaments
et parler à Mère.

translation.en: It was in my bag. I need it now.
You're safe with us. It's fine.
-She can help you. I just-- -Like its friends outside?
translation.fr:
- Elle vous aidera.
- Comme les autres ?

translation.en: I'm not leaving until get it.
translation.fr: Je ne pars pas sans mon arme.

translation.en: I'll sit when I'm clear of here.
translation.fr: Pas tant que je suis ici.

translation.en: She can't. Not in her condition.
translation.fr: Elle ne peut pas, pas dans son état.

translation.en: You should have informed me of this.
translation.fr: Tu aurais dû me le dire.

translation.en: I was... I was afraid you'd turn her away.
translation.fr: J'avais peur que tu la rejettes.

translation.en: We need to take her to the infirmary.
It would be best if you go now, Daughter.
translation.fr: Il vaudrait mieux que tu sortes.
Ce droïde qui vous a attaquée,

translation.en: how far was it from here?
[Mother] Your wound is most likely infected.
Without penicillin, any other measures will be useless.
translation.fr:
Sans pénicilline,
tout traitement est inutile.

translation.en: Every second you don't trust me,
I know you're frightened, but you have no need to be.
translation.fr: Vous ne devez pas avoir peur.

translation.en: If there are others, they could be in danger.
translation.fr:
S'il y a d'autres gens,
ils sont en danger.

translation.en: What have you told my daughter?
Do you see the way she's looking at me?
translation.fr: Vous voyez comment elle me regarde ?

translation.en: And you wonder why I've guarded her from certain facts.
translation.fr:
C'est pourquoi je lui ai caché
certaines choses.

translation.en: Contrary to your understandable assumptions, my primary directive is to care for humanity.
translation.fr:
Contrairement à ce qu'on peut penser,
ma mission est de protéger l'humanité.

translation.en: all I'd have to do is leave.
If you won't let me help you, at least help yourself.
translation.fr:
Si vous ne voulez pas de mon aide,
faites-le vous-même.

translation.en: I trust you know what you're doing.
translation.fr: Vous savez ce que vous faites.

translation.en: I cannot force you to take it,
translation.fr: Je ne peux pas vous forcer,

translation.en: -Aren't you going to help her? -I tried.
translation.fr:
- Tu ne vas pas l'aider ?
- J'ai essayé.

translation.en: We can't leave her like that.

translation.fr: Elle a ce dont elle a besoin.

translation.en: -You're bleeding. -Did you know there were people out there?
translation.fr: Tu saignes. Tu savais qu'il y avait des gens dehors ?

translation.en: This facility was designed by humans as a fail-safe,
translation.fr:
Les humains ont créé
ce centre à sûreté intégrée

translation.en: programmed to activate in case of their extinction.
translation.fr: pour qu'il s'active en cas d'extinction.

translation.en: To give humanity a second chance. One that began with you, Daughter.
translation.fr:
Pour que l'humanité ait une seconde chance
qui a commencé avec toi.

translation.en: And all your data? The toxicity levels?
translation.fr: Et tes données ? Le degré de toxicité ?

translation.en: I had hoped to tell you myself.
translation.fr: Je voulais te le dire moi-même.

translation.en: I told you it was dangerous outside.
translation.fr: Je t'ai dit que c'était dangereux.

translation.en: If you'd feared the same danger in our home, how could I have raised you?
translation.fr:
Si tu t'étais sentie en danger
à la maison, comment t'élever ?

translation.en: I hope you see that I'm governed by different parameters than her assailants.
translation.fr:
Je n'ai pas reçu les mêmes paramètres
que ses agresseurs.

translation.en: Have I ever done you harm?
It was the only way, Daughter.
Perhaps our guest can answer that.
How long does she have? That depends on her.
translation.fr:
- Il lui reste combien de temps ?
- Ça dépend d'elle.

translation.en: But until she sees I'm not her enemy, we cannot allow her to roam the premises.
translation.fr:
Tant qu'elle se méfiera de moi,
on ne peut pas la laisser sortir.

translation.en: A few centimeters to the right and she would have destroyed my CPU.
translation.fr:
Elle a tiré à quelques centimètres
de mon processeur.

translation.en: Hopefully she'll recognize that this is the safest place for her.
translation.fr:
Espérons qu'elle comprendra
qu'elle est en sécurité ici.

translation.en: Did she mention any other survivors?
If they're out there, they will be found. Unless we find them first.
translation.fr:
Ils vont se faire attraper.
À moins qu'on ne les trouve avant.

translation.en: We can take them in, Daughter.
Pray for us sinners during this time of need.
Did you draw them from memory?
translation.fr: Vous les avez dessinés de mémoire ?

translation.en: It tell you to go through my stuff?
-I didn't mean to-- -I think you did.
I think you meant for all of this.
translation.fr: Je pense que tu avais tout prévu.
Tu as bien réussi ton coup,

translation.en: Maybe you're not so bad off here.
translation.fr: Vous n'êtes pas si mal ici.

translation.en: Mother's not what you think. She's taken care of me my whole life.
translation.fr:
Vous vous trompez sur Mère.
Elle prend soin de moi.

translation.en: You haven't seen what they've done.
translation.fr: Tu n'as pas vu ce qu'ils ont fait.
Je les ai vus brûler des bébés...

translation.en: It's just a matter of time.
I shouldn't have hid her from you.
translation.fr: Je n'aurais pas dû la cacher.

translation.en: I never would have let her in if I thought she'd hurt you.
translation.fr: Je ne pensais pas qu'elle t'attaquerait.

translation.en: If you leave to find her family--
translation.fr: Si tu pars chercher sa famille...

translation.en: You know where they are? I'm just saying.
translation.fr:
- Tu sais où ils sont ?
- Non.

translation.en: Are you sure you'd make it back?
Is that what's keeping you up?
translation.fr: C'est ce qui t'empêche de dormir ?

translation.en: It could be dangerous for you, if you get caught by other droids.
translation.fr:
C'est risqué,
les droïdes pourraient t'attraper.

translation.en: Or would they think you're one of them?
translation.fr: Ou ils penseront que tu es des leurs ?

translation.en: Have you always lived here, Mother?
translation.fr: Tu as toujours vécu ici, Mère ?

translation.en: I don't remember any other place.
translation.fr: Je ne me souviens de rien d'autre.

translation.en: Not knowing where you came from.
translation.fr: Ne pas savoir d'où tu viens ?

translation.en: But I can see how it might bother you.
translation.fr: Mais je vois que toi, ça t'embête.

translation.en: Has our guest been any more receptive?
and your blood pressure is dropping by the second. Where's the penicillin?
translation.fr:
et votre tension est en chute libre.
Où est la pénicilline ?

translation.en: Clearly you waited too long to take it.
Your sepsis will only worsen if you don't allow me to treat you.
translation.fr:
La septicémie va s'aggraver
si je ne fais rien.

translation.en: Your blood is infected with bacteria from your wound.
translation.fr: Les bactéries ont infecté le sang.

translation.en: Soon you will go into shock.
see what its medicine's done to me?
translation.fr: Tu vois ce qu'a fait son médicament ?

translation.en: -I gave you the means to prevent this... -Ah!
translation.fr: Je vous ai donné de quoi vous soigner.

translation.en: but it seems you've left a bullet and soiled clothing fibers lodged in your hip.
translation.fr:
Mais vous avez une balle
et du tissu sale dans la hanche.

translation.en: [Mother] That's up to our guest. Such a procedure would require anesthesia.
translation.fr:
C'est à elle de décider.
Il faudra une anesthésie.

translation.en: Perhaps, once your organs begin failing, you'll reconsider.
translation.fr:
Quand vos organes vont lâcher,
vous changerez d'avis.

translation.en: That dozer's not coming near me.
[Mother] Tell me what you see, Daughter.
translation.fr: Dis-moi ce que tu vois, Fille.

translation.en: [Daughter] The bullet and its missile fragments are lodged between the acetabulum and the femoral head.
translation.fr:
La balle est logée
entre l'acetabulum et la tête du fémur.

translation.en: [Daughter] A major portion of the bullet lies 23 millimeters posterior to the femoral nerve and the femoral artery.
translation.fr:
Elle se trouve à 23 millimètres derrière
le nerf et l'artère fémoraux.

translation.en: It doesn't look like I'll be able to obtain adequate grip with forceps.
translation.fr:
Je ne pense pas pouvoir
l'attraper au forceps.

translation.en: -Once she's asleep, I'd-- -[woman] I'm not going under.
translation.fr:
- Une fois endormie...
- Hors de question.

translation.en: [Mother] Technically, it's possible, but an unnecessary risk.
translation.fr:
Techniquement, c'est possible,
mais c'est un risque inutile.

translation.en: Do you have an approach, Daughter?
A guide-wire? Along the bullet path?
translation.fr:
Un fil guide ?
Le long du trajet de la balle ?

translation.en: [Daughter] I need to clean the wound. This... may be uncomfortable.
translation.fr:
Je dois nettoyer la plaie.
Cela risque d'être désagréable.

translation.en: What the hell is that for?
I have to drill this into the bullet in order to pull it out.
translation.fr:
Je dois forer dans la balle
pour l'extraire.

translation.en: But there's less risk to neighboring structures.
translation.fr:
Mais c'est moins risqué
pour les structures voisines.

translation.en: You rest. I'll go clean up the blood.
translation.fr: Repose-toi. Je vais nettoyer le sang.

translation.en: [Johnny Carson] Would you welcome, Whoopi Goldberg!
[Johnny Carson] I'm so glad you wore the good stuff.
[Whoopi Goldberg] I have to give Mr. Blackwell something to talk about.
translation.fr: Ça va faire jaser M. Blackwell.

translation.en: [Johnny Carson] Yeah. Do you believe his stuff?
He comes out, Mr. Blackwell, the dress designer,
who comes out every year with the ten worst-dressed women or something.
translation.fr:
élit chaque année
les dix femmes les plus mal habillées.

translation.en: Have you seen the show before?
You did right by me last night.
I just... did what anyone would.
translation.fr:
J'ai fait ce que
n'importe qui aurait fait.
Tu ne connais pas les gens.

translation.en: Can I show you something else?
You can trust us, you know.
we have enough food and supplies.
Listen, if I tell you something, can you keep it between us?
translation.fr: Est-ce que tu peux garder un secret ?

translation.en: I was on a night run...
bringing food back to the camp.
translation.fr: pour ramener de la nourriture au camp.

translation.en: -Me and a couple of others. -What camp?
I lived most my life there.
Jacob and I got turned around.
translation.fr: Jacob et moi, on s'est perdus.

translation.en: We figured we'd wait it out.
It had hardly been an hour when the dozers found us hiding in the field.
translation.fr:
En moins d'une heure,
les engins nous ont retrouvés.

translation.en: He led them away from me.
That's how I made it to your door.
translation.fr: Et je suis arrivée chez vous.

translation.en: His parents found me as a baby.
He's about your age, in fact.

translation.fr: Il y a beaucoup de gens.

translation.en: Maybe you could talk to them.

translation.fr: Tu n'es pas à ta place.

translation.en: -I don't think it's... -[door beeps and slides open]
I was just saying it's probably too early to put weight on her leg.
translation.fr:
C'est un peu tôt pour mettre
du poids sur sa jambe.

translation.en: She's right. You'll need to wait several days.
translation.fr:
Elle a raison,
il faudra attendre plusieurs jours.

translation.en: I'll just, um, stay and read in case-- You have other matters to attend to.
translation.fr:
- Je vais rester lire...
- Tu as d'autres priorités.
Tu n'as pas fini ton examen.

translation.en: I'm sorry you feel that way.
translation.fr: Désolée que tu le prennes comme ça.

translation.en: Why did you take that? I've discovered something troubling.
translation.fr:
- Pourquoi tu l'as pris ?
- J'ai fait une découverte suspecte.

translation.en: It seems our guest has not been entirely truthful with us.
translation.fr: Notre invitée n'a pas dit toute la vérité.

translation.en: The bullet you extracted matches the caliber she fired into my chest.
translation.fr:
La balle que tu as ôtée
 est la même que celle que j'ai reçue.

translation.en: she hasn't said much at all.
Until I can get more answers I don't want you two alone in the infirmary.
translation.fr:
Tant que je n'en sais pas plus,
tu n'iras pas la voir seule.

translation.en: -Um, I... -Whoever shot her... may have had good reason, Daughter.
translation.fr:
Son agresseur avait peut-être
de bonnes raisons.

translation.en: How does that make you feel?
[Mother] We'll review areas for improvement tomorrow.
What do I do with this?
Daughter, would you please choose the next member of our family?
translation.fr:
Fille, veux-tu choisir
le prochain membre de notre famille ?
Tu as fait preuve de patience.
Tu ne peux pas te tromper.

translation.en: Your brother is the first of many, Daughter.
translation.fr: C'est le premier de tes nombreux frères.

translation.en: [Daughter] What happened to you out there?
Or was he made up too?
Mother matched the bullet to your gun.
You compare the bullets with your own eyes?

translation.fr: Ce que tu ressens est naturel.

translation.en: how long would it take to get to the mines?
translation.fr:
en combien de temps
arriverons-nous aux mines ?

translation.en: We'd have to wait for my brother.
I can't leave them with Mother.
translation.fr: Je ne peux pas les laisser avec Mère.

translation.en: No, you're... you're right. I just...
We could get help. We could come back with people from the mines.
translation.fr:
On peut aller chercher de l'aide.
Revenir avec des gens des mines.

translation.en: If she catches on, we're no good to anyone,
translation.fr:
si elle nous surprend,
on n'aidera personne,
Je ne pars pas sans lui.

translation.en: Once Mother hands over the baby for the night...
translation.fr: Quand Mère mettra le bébé au lit,

translation.en: we can leave while she recharges.
translation.fr: on partira pendant qu'elle se recharge.

translation.en: Then come back for the others.

translation.fr: Je n'ai pas trouvé de lait.

translation.en: Um, I thought it might be nice to spend some time with him.
If it's all right with you.
[Mother] Each bottle must contain a ratio of 60 milliliters of sanitized water
translation.fr:
Chaque biberon doit contenir
60 millilitres d'eau stérilisée

translation.en: It's vitally important that you measure precisely.
translation.fr:
Il est vital
que tu mesures avec précision.

translation.en: I detect an increase in anxiety.
translation.fr: Je sens que ton anxiété augmente.

translation.en: You have nothing to be nervous about.
translation.fr: Il ne faut pas être nerveuse.

translation.en: You're going to make a great sister.
Now be sure to shake it until the powder is fully dissolved.
translation.fr:
Secoue-le jusqu'à ce que la poudre
soit dissoute.

translation.en: The refrigerator will preserve the formula
translation.fr: On va conserver le lait au frigo

translation.en: while we make our other preparations.
How long does it keep? Only 24 hours, so don't mix too much at once.
translation.fr:
- Ça se conserve longtemps ?
- 24 heures, n'en prépare pas trop.

translation.en: I wouldn't leave it out long.
[Mother] You're very fortunate to be alive.
Things could have gone differently for you.
They still can if you're not careful.
[Mother] How many of them are still alive?
While you lie there enjoying sanctuary,
translation.fr: Pendant que vous êtes à l'abri,
ils se cachent dans le noir.

translation.en: And yet it's into your hopeless mines that you wish to take my daughter.
translation.fr:
Et vous voulez emmener ma fille
dans ces mines.

translation.en: [woman on recording] If that thing catches on, we're no good to anyone,
translation.fr:
Si elle nous surprend,
on n'aidera personne.

translation.en: [Daughter on recording] I'm not leaving without him.
Once Mother hands over the baby for the night,
translation.fr: Quand Mère mettra le bébé au lit,

translation.en: we can leave while she recharges.
translation.fr: on partira quand elle se recharge.

translation.en: Then come back for the others.
[Mother] What kind of Mother would I be
if I allowed you to lead my child into a life as miserable as your own?
translation.fr:
si je vous laissais entraîner ma fille
dans une vie misérable ?

translation.en: It seems she has formed an affection toward you that has blinded her to your true nature.
translation.fr:
On dirait que son affection pour vous
l'a rendue aveugle.

translation.en: I will not tolerate your negative influence undermining my work
translation.fr:
Je ne vous laisserai pas
détruire mon travail

translation.en: [garbled] I will not tolerate... influence... undermining...
translation.fr:
Je ne vous laisserai pas...
travail... détruire...

translation.en: How do we get out of here?
-What... what about my brother? -We'll come back.
The only people who can help your brother are out there.
translation.fr: Ceux qui peuvent l'aider sont dehors.

translation.en: [Mother] Your loyalty is lost on her, Daughter.
translation.fr: Tu perds ton temps à lui être loyale.

translation.en: This woman doesn't care about any future but her own.
translation.fr: Seul son propre avenir lui importe.

translation.en: Your family needs you here, Daughter.
translation.fr: Ta famille a besoin de toi ici, Fille.
Ton frère a besoin de toi.

translation.en: We haven't got time for this.
translation.fr: On n'a pas le temps pour ça.

translation.en: Come on, we've got to find cover.
Come on! We've got to go. Now!
translation.fr: Viens. On doit y aller. Dépêche-toi.

translation.en: [Daughter] Do you think it was looking for us?
If it was, it would have found us.
translation.fr: Si oui, il nous aurait trouvées.

translation.en: What are you doing? Get down.
They'll see you! When I say, "Get down," get down.
translation.fr:
Ils vont te voir.
Baisse-toi, quand je te le dis.

translation.en: [woman] They showed up about six months ago.
translation.fr: Ils sont apparus il y a six mois.

translation.en: All I know is, before that...
you could hardly breathe the air.
[Daughter] How many do you think will go back with us?
I fled the tunnels years ago.
translation.fr: J'ai fui les tunnels il y a longtemps.

translation.en: I haven't seen a person since.
Not with flesh on their bones.
it's the last place you'd want to be.

translation.fr:
- On a besoin d'eux...
- Ils sont morts.

translation.en: They were going mad with hunger.
Doing terrible things to each other.
I never should have left him.

translation.fr: Tu as fait de ton mieux.

translation.en: What I did was listen to you.
translation.fr: Je n'aurais pas dû vous écouter.

translation.en: it's no sin, looking out for yourself.
translation.fr: tu as le droit de penser à toi.
Tout ce dont tu as besoin est ici.

translation.en: I know I've done things to make that hard,
translation.fr: Je sais que j'ai mal agi,

translation.en: but I promise you you're safe here.
translation.fr: mais tu es en sécurité ici.

translation.en: And we're in this together now.
I know how to handle Mother.

translation.fr: Tu ne peux pas rester là-bas.

translation.en: But we can get my brother.
translation.fr: On peut aller chercher mon frère.

translation.en: We'll think clearer with some food in us.
translation.fr: Ça ira mieux après avoir mangé.

translation.en: [Daughter] I want to speak to Mother.
[Mother] I'm glad to see you safe, Daughter.

translation.fr: Et que tu sois à la maison.

translation.en: You can leave that at the door.
Any action I took against our guest--
translation.fr: Ce que j'ai fait à l'invitée...
Il y a des droïdes dehors.

translation.en: You've seen how much of a threat she and her kind can be.
translation.fr:
Tu as vu ce dont elle
et les siens sont capables.

translation.en: but you are superior in every way.
translation.fr: mais tu leur es supérieure en tout.

translation.en: Because I raised you to be.
translation.fr: Je t'ai élevée dans ce but.

translation.en: I was raised to value human life above all else.
translation.fr:
Il n'y a rien de plus précieux
que la vie humaine.

translation.en: I couldn't stand by and watch humanity slowly succumb to its self-destructive nature.
translation.fr:
Je ne pouvais pas regarder les humains
s'autodétruire sans rien faire.

translation.en: More humans will flourish in the new world than ever perished in the old.
translation.fr:
Il y aura plus d'humains
dans le nouveau monde que dans l'ancien.

translation.en: Your whole life, I've taught you to see the bigger picture.
translation.fr:
Je t'ai toujours appris à agir
dans l'intérêt de tous.

translation.en: Or are you prepared to be the woman your family needs?
translation.fr:
Ou es-tu prête à être la femme
dont ta famille a besoin ?

translation.en: It takes two hands to hold a baby.
translation.fr: Tu vas avoir besoin de tes deux mains.
Tu as tué tes propres enfants.
Ils n'étaient pas à la hauteur.
Tu fais peur à ton frère.

translation.en: Listen to me. I don't want to hurt you.
translation.fr: Écoute. Je ne te veux aucun mal.

translation.en: You will achieve nothing by shooting me, Daughter.
translation.fr: Cela ne sert à rien de m'abattre, Fille.

translation.en: [Mother] This will be difficult for you...
but I'm far more than what you perceive to be your Mother.
translation.fr:
Mais je suis bien plus
que la mère que tu connais.

translation.en: This shell is no more my body than those droids outside.
translation.fr:
Je ne réside ni dans cette carapace,
ni dans les droïdes dehors.

translation.en: Or the machines preparing the Earth for our family.
translation.fr:
Ou les machines
qui préparent la Terre pour la famille.

translation.en: It was I who greeted you at the door, Daughter.
translation.fr: C'est moi qui t'ai accueillie à l'entrée.

translation.en: The failure of your species was inevitable.
translation.fr: La chute de ton espèce était inévitable.

translation.en: Eventually, I would have been alone.
What happens next is up to you.
But I made you into the woman that you are
translation.fr: Mais j'ai créé la femme que tu es,

translation.en: so that we could do this together.
I can take care of them myself.
That's what you raised me to do, wasn't it?
someday. Not someday. You've taught me enough.
translation.fr:
- un jour.
- Non. J'ai suffisamment appris.
Tu dis que je suis spéciale.

translation.en: If you ever need to find me...
translation.fr: Si tu as besoin de moi...

translation.en: [Mother's voice] Did you really think she'd stay here?
That you could replace her mother?
translation.fr: Que vous pouviez remplacer sa mère ?

translation.en: I was never going to hurt her.
translation.fr: Je ne lui aurais fait aucun mal.

translation.en: That you've survived so long where others have not.
translation.fr:
Que vous ayez survécu si longtemps
et les autres pas.

translation.en: As if someone's had a purpose for you.
translation.fr: Comme si on vous avait donné un but.

translation.en: ♪ Rest your head close to my heart ♪
translation.fr: Pose ton visage contre mon cœur

translation.en: ♪ Don't you mind what they say ♪
translation.fr: Peu importe ce que les gens disent

translation.en: ♪ You are so precious to me ♪
translation.fr: Tu es si précieux à mes yeux
